Text:
Our families need support. Now is the time for us to deliver and show up for them as they have continuously shown up for our families.

We can do this by investing in America's care infrastructure because #CareCantWait and it's #TimeForAction. 

https://t.co/Yi1XPXdarv

We all know of a caregiver in our family and the sacrifices they continuously make to provide essential care to children and ailing loved ones in our family--many times compromising their own emotional and mental well-being. 

https://t.co/BJUZUYeRfn
1/2

As a mother and daughter, I genuinely understand that missing work to stay home with a sick child or an ailing parent is not always an option-- Needing additional care shouldn't put our families underwater. We have a duty and an obligation to help. 

#CareCantWait

While the typical African American household’s income has risen since the 1970s, African American  households still earn just 62 cents for every dollar earned by white households – a difference of ~$30,000 per year.  

#JECxCBC

https://t.co/mWNwA87SpJ

—one-eighth that of white families ($188,200). 

This report's key findings highlight that despite significant economic progress over the past few decades, African Americans experience far more precarious economic conditions than white Americans or the population as a whole.

2/2

I want to thank the @TheBlackCaucus and @JECDems for releasing this thorough analysis of the current economic status of African Americans. The report determined that in 2019, the median wealth of African American families ($24,100) was approximately—

https://t.co/KTqfEue7Np

1/2

—disproportionally impacting Black and Latino children, whose families desperately need resources to mitigate this pandemic.

#ChildTaxCredit 

2/2 https://t.co/LLgvjazMAx

No child in America should go to bed hungry and no parent deserves to ration their resources to meet their children's most essential needs. 

Failure to extend the #ChildTaxCredit has only exacerbated conditions for America's children—

1/2 https://t.co/Njf4T2Skz7

—a neglectful and poor decision. 

We can end child poverty. 

This is a choice. 

Our children need for us to make the right one.

#ChildTaxCredit 

2/2 https://t.co/R7KRbgeRed

Our children cannot afford, nor should they have to endure, the politicization of the poverty they are experiencing. 

3.7 million more children are living in poverty than they were in December, as a result of the GOP’s opposition to extending the #ChildTaxCredit—

1/2 https://t.co/6ITuwzp196

Happy President’s Day @potus, and to all of our President’s!

3/3

On this President’s Day, let us reflect on this heritage of liberty and Democracy, and the freedoms which we as Americans benefit from and enjoy. They hinge on our duty to protect and enrich that inheritance which we will leave to future generations.

2/3

The President of the United States is the chief custodian of our constitution, protector of our democracy and entrusted as President Lincoln stated, to ensure that “democracy is the government of the people, for the people and by the people.”

1/3

I especially want to thank the 30 athletes from California, who competed with grit and tact. 

We are all proud of you!

I sincerely thank all the elite athletes who represented the United States with grace, dignity and pride at this year’s Winter Olympics. You captured the attention of our nation together as you competed, triumphed and demonstrated your strength, agility and class.

I want to thank Valerie Gomez, PhD for creating the TELACU Education Foundation & Latina Grad Guide Scholarship, a beautiful tribute to her grandparents who encouraged her family to pursue higher education. Applicants can apply by Feb. 28 by clicking here: https://t.co/AulYK151Pj https://t.co/kvP3XnlEH9
The LA Rams are Super Bowl champs! You played a great game and deserve this win.
Let’s go Rams!
Great knowing that my sunny South East LA community is contributing in a big way to making the Winter Olympics happen! https://t.co/xnrP9rrJ7T

Wishing the best of luck to all of America’s athletes competing in the Winter Olympics.
 
We ‘re rooting for you!

Thank you for making Downey and California’s 40th Congressional District proud.

I am overjoyed to see fellow Latinas from our community making history. 2/2

Congratulations to Priscila Coronado for being elected as the first Latina president of the prestigious Harvard Law Review.

Priscila, the daughter of Mexican-American immigrants, is a proud product of Downey! 1/2

Since November, the economy has added more than 1.6 million jobs.
 
In spite of the pandemic, President Biden is leading one of the greatest economic recoveries in history.
 
His plan is working. We must continue to #BuildBackBetter.

February is #BlackHistoryMonth – a time for us to highlight the many invaluable contributions Black Americans have made to America’s greatness and prosperity.
 
Looking forward to the day that we honor the contributions of Black Americans every day - not just in February.

The @RamsNFL are going to Super Bowl LVI!

Looking forward to watching our team play at #RAMSHouse against the @Bengals. Go Rams!

Today, we celebrate the 13th anniversary of the #LillyLedbetter Fair Pay Act, a law that protects workers from paycheck discrimination by their employer.
 
As we commemorate this day, we must continue to fight against unequal pay in the workplace.

On International Holocaust Remembrance Day, we remember the six millions Jews and all those whose lives were extinguished by the horrors of the Holocaust.
 
Today, let us recommit ourselves to never allowing these terrible acts to transpire ever again.

A son of immigrants, he spent his life serving his community, country, and working families in L.A. and across the U.S. 

My thoughts are with his wife Arcy, their children and grandchildren.

May he rest in peace. 2/2

I’m saddened to hear of the passing of former U.S. Rep. Esteban Torres, whom I had the privilege of serving with.

He was a mentor and an effective and respected member of the House. 1/2

A pesar de heredar una de las peores economías en décadas, el presidente Biden ha liderado una recuperación vertiginosa.

Nuestro trabajo no ha terminado. Debemos continuar a reconstruir mejor.

Despite inheriting one of the worst economies in decades, President Biden has led a roaring recovery.
 
Our work is not over. We must continue to Build Back Better. https://t.co/weZPXB1Yn1

Stephen Breyer has served his country as a federal judge for more than 40 years, with nearly 28 years of service as a Supreme Court Justice.

His keen, pragmatic legal mind will be missed on the Court when he retires later this year.

Thursday, the U.S. Treasury will be hosting a webinar on the final rule on state and local coronavirus recovery funds for state, local, and tribal governments.
 
To listen in, register at the link below:
 
https://t.co/QmC0V5vms8

Today, we honor and celebrate the legacy of Martin Luther King, Jr., a man who spent his life in pursuit of equality and justice for Black Americans.

His work is not yet complete, but as he once famously said “the arc of the moral universe is long but it bends toward justice.”

La inscripción abierta termina MAÑANA, el 15 de enero. Vaya a https://t.co/imNLiS5oEi para asegurarse que está cubierto por el resto de 2022. Si necesita ayuda, está disponible de forma gratuita llamando a https://t.co/imNLiS5oEi al 1-800-318-2596.
 
No espere. ¡Regístrase ahora!

Open Enrollment ends TOMORROW, Jan. 15th.

Go to https://t.co/fmotiXq4CJ now to make sure you're covered for the rest of 2022.
If you need help, it is available for for free by calling the https://t.co/imNLiS5oEi Call Center at 1-800-318-2596.

Don't wait. Sign up now!

President Biden is right.

Now is the time to reform the filibuster to combat voter suppression and protect voting rights. https://t.co/wdz95LjmXx

I am sad to hear of the passing of firefighter Jonathan Flagler, an LA County Firefighter who served 19 years with the City of Vernon fire department.
 
My thoughts and prayers are with his wife and children. 

May he rest in peace.

President Biden’s plan to rebuild the economy is working.

We must continue working with him to  #BuildBackBetter. https://t.co/DLIjBiUYgt
January 6, 2021 is a stark reminder that our democracy must never be taken for granted for it is fragile and must be protected by all of us. 2/2

I will never forget that horrible and shameful day.

The personal fear and terror I experienced knowing our democracy was under attack as my colleagues and I were rushed from the House Chamber will stay with me forever. 1/2

The Rose Parade is one of my favorite New Year traditions.

It is great seeing the @CityofDowney participate with such a creative float. https://t.co/2qUp8YBXlX

Senator Reid  lived a remarkable life and with his passing America has lost one of its greatest patriots and champions. My thoughts are with his beloved wife Landra and their family. 

May he rest in peace. 2/2

Senator Harry Reid possessed a fighting spirit that allowed him to overcome many obstacles. 

Across more than forty years of public service, Senator Reid worked tirelessly to improve the lives of Americans who struggled like he did as a child growing up in extreme poverty. 1/2

Happy first day of #Kwanzaa to all who celebrate.

May the coming year be full of blessings, purpose and unity for you and your family.

Desmond Tutu was a voice of moral clarity and a champion of justice in South Africa at a time when speaking out against apartheid could cost you your life.

His death is an immeasurable loss to his country and the world.

Wishing a very Merry Christmas 🎄to all who celebrate.
 
May your holiday be filled with love, family and friendship. https://t.co/YYQIhNSNil
While I will not be seeking reelection in 2022, I look forward to continue to work for the people of my district in the new year and long after I leave public office. 3/3

After thirty years in the House of Representatives, the time has come for me to spend more time with my family. 

Therefore, I have decided not to seek reelection.2/3

Serving my constituents in Congress has been the single most distinguished honor of my life.

Over my many years of public service, I have always strived to do that which is best to help improve my community and my country. 1/3

It was great meeting with fellow LA county leaders today to talk about what President Biden’s historic infrastructure plan will do to improve roads, bridges, public transportation and other critical infrastructure in our communities. 

Now is the time we #BuildBackBetter https://t.co/2tzVUm9BpN

I am extremely disappointed by the Senate parliamentarian’s decision.

Immigrants helped build America into the great country it is today.

While this is an unfortunate set back, we must continue to fight for the rights of our immigrant friends, neighbors & loved ones #homeishere

In 2021, American families have faced:
🌡 The hottest summer on record
⛈ Devastating flooding
🔥 Monster wildfires and brutal heat waves

@POTUS Biden's #BuildBackBetter Act makes historic investments to fight the climate crisis.

The time to pass this urgent legislation is now.

Tonight I voted to protect the full faith and credit of the United States. 
 
Raising the debt limit is financially sound and will protect American families from a massive economic disaster.

Congress subpoenaed Mark Meadows to examine his role in the plot to overturn the results of the 2020 election.
 
He refused to comply.

I am voting to hold him in contempt of Congress because no one is above the law. Those who undermine our democracy must be held accountable.

More than 800,000 Americans have lost their lives to COVID-19.

The pandemic will continue devastating families and communities across America until we all get vaccinated.

Protect your family and loved ones. Talk to your healthcare provider and get vaccinated today.

I am proud to  cosponsor a House Resolution honoring the 73rd anniversary of #HumanRightsDay & the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

We must continue to combat discrimination in every form & ensure each individual is treated with respect & dignity.

I am proud to have voted to pass the Protecting Our Democracy Act.

This sweeping piece of legislation will reaffirm Congress’ constitutional role as a coequal branch of government and protect our democracy from the abuses of any future president, regardless of their party.

This Mexican-American mother-daughter duo bravely competed against 40 other international teams and obtained the top prize. Thank you for making California’s 40th Congressional District proud. I can’t wait to try their award-winning paella. 2/2

Congratulations to Maria and Natalie Curie co-owners and chefs at @elcoraloense restaurant in Bell Gardens for winning “Best International Paella” at The International Paella Competition in Sueca, Spain. 1/2

https://t.co/Q5OaYlvCS3

Proud to have worked with @HerreraBeutler, @USRepKCastor, and @RepMullin to pass the #SHINEforAutumn Act, legislation that will lower the U.S. stillbirth rate by increasing research, education, and awareness around the issue of stillbirth in the United States. https://t.co/EFSYSYzr1m
Thank you @gracenapolitano for inviting my constituent to testify. https://t.co/iQkNdSnJrc

I'm proud to be an original cosponsor of the SHINE for Autumn Act.

For far too long stillbirth has existed in the shadows of our maternity care system.

It is time to bring stillbirth out of the shadows and invest in education and research that will save babies lives. https://t.co/Jyo2Ppy2Aa
These survivors in the military protect our great nation like every other service member and they deserve these protections. I honor that service and I am proud to vote for these provisions. 3/3
...by reforming the Uniform Code of Military Justice - reforms that will strengthen accountability, provide robust oversight, and deliver justice for survivors of sexual assault. 2/3

The NDAA is Congress’ annual investment in the national security of the U. S. This legislation secures a pay raise for  troops, makes investments to improve the technological capabilities of our armed forces, and takes historic action to address sexual assault in the military...

The pandemic has been devastating to seniors & families.

Tonight, I joined my Democratic colleagues in passing S.610 - a bill to prevent painful, aimless cuts to Medicare & other programs that provide critical benefits & services to American families & their communities.

Este evento se presentará en dos sesiones y los asistentes tendrán la opción de asistir en su idioma preferido: Una sesión de inglés a las 11AM PT y una sesión en español a las 6PM PT. 

Para español, regístrese aquí:
https://t.co/oveR0S9Hkm?
Hoy la congresista Karen Bass y yo les invitamos a participar en una reunión virtual para informar sobre recursos para pequeñas empresas y organizaciones sin fines de lucro.
Every single individual in our country deserves a chance at the American Dream — and we have a chance to make that dream a reality. #TheMomentIsNow #WeAreHome #HereToStay 2/2

Immigrants are an essential fabric of our society.

Throughout the pandemic, they have served on the frontlines and we must ensure we do everything in our power to protect Dreamers, TPS holders, farmworkers, and essential workers from deportation. 1/2 https://t.co/ZqiNm6pdtX

80 years ago today, Pearl Harbor came under attack. The assault brought the U.S. into WW II, a brutal conflict that claimed the lives of millions.

Today, let's remember all the lives sacrificed at Pearl Harbor & recommit ourselves to ending war & violent conflict once & for all.

Este evento se presentará en dos sesiones y los asistentes tendrán la opción de asistir en su idioma preferido: Una sesión de inglés a las 11AM PT y una sesión en español a las 6PM PT.

Para español, regístrese aquí:
https://t.co/oveR0S9Hkm

La congresista Karen Bass y yo les invitamos a participar en una reunión virtual para informar sobre recursos para pequeñas empresas y organizaciones sin fines de lucro, mañana, martes 7 de diciembre de 2021. https://t.co/LatOMecDb0

This event will be presented in two sessions and attendees will have the option to attend in their preferred language: English session at 11AM PT and a Spanish session at 6PM PT.

For English , please follow this link: https://t.co/d4SCVgoMUh
.@RepKarenBass and I invite you to participate in a virtual town hall on resources for small businesses and nonprofits happening tomorrow, Tuesday, December 7, 2021. https://t.co/6QEADtTviM

Bob Dole was a father, husband, and veteran who dedicated his long, accomplished life to the service of his country.

His legacy as a committed public servant has been an inspiration to generations of Americans.

May he rest in peace.

Pleased to join @SpeakerPelosi, @LeaderHoyer and Chair @rosadelauro in signing this continuing resolution.

This is only a short-term fix. I hope our Republican colleagues will now work with us to negotiate and pass full year funding bills for the American people. https://t.co/eMrl1GIMzK

.@POTUS is leading one of the strongest economic recoveries on record. 

Through the American Rescue Plan and his broader economic agenda, President Biden has job numbers rising and unemployment falling. 

We must continue to support his plan to #BuildBackBetter for the people. https://t.co/2wVXV26OJl
This continuing resolution is another temporary patch that keeps us from addressing the immediate needs of American families, veterans, and our national security.

Funding the government is one of the most important responsibilities of Congress. Unfortunately, the GOP's refusal to negotiate with Democrats on full year funding makes it necessary to pass continuing resolutions which fall short of meeting our obligation to the American people. https://t.co/6XSbKVD8Nk
I look forward to continue to work with Gene on creating sustainable jobs and opportunities for my constituents. 2/2

Just got off the phone with Gene Gebolys, founder of @NewsWorldEnergy, to congratulate him on his company's role in United Airlines' first passenger flight using 100% sustainable aviation fuel - produced at their Paramount facility in my district! 1/2 https://t.co/TQE6scGCQg

On #WorldAidsDay we remember the millions of family, friends, and loved ones lost to AIDS and its related illnesses.

Extraordinary progress has been made in treating HIV/AIDS over the last 40 years, but we cannot stop fighting until we defeat HIV/AIDS once and for all.

Carrie Meek was an icon who dedicated her life to selfless public service. She was an educator who broke boundaries & championed the causes of equality, opportunity, & kindness. I was honored to serve with & learn from her. My heart is with her family & all who knew & loved her.
Wishing our friends in the Jewish community a very #HappyHanukkah! I hope each night of celebration is safe and filled with warmth, joy and light. https://t.co/0RUBr66IkM

Wishing a joyful day of gratitude to all this Thanksgiving. Thanks to the vaccine, safe in-person celebrations are now possible for many. I’m grateful to serve CA’s amazing 40th District every day and for the love and bonds shared by our families and communities. https://t.co/taNWw7saAb

As of today, @US_FDA has given the OK for fully-vaccinated adults to receive the Pfizer/BioNTech or Moderna #COVID19 booster shot! Learn more about the booster & book an appointment at a location near you here: https://t.co/r8unnAMZ5d

The numbers are clear: the American people support Democrats' work to #BuildBackBetter! The historic legislation we passed today #ForThePeople will continue to benefit working families for decades to come. #BuildBackBetterAct https://t.co/RkpLLOwqwM

The SELA Community Vaccination center will close on Mon, Nov. 29. Until then vaccines are available Mon. 11 AM-6 PM, Weds. 8 AM-4 PM, or Sat. 8 AM-12 PM. For vaccinations after that date, visit Wesley Health, 6912 Ajax Ave, Bell Gardens, 90201. For more info, call 323-538-7802.

We need legislation that is transformative for families with an expanded Child Tax Credit, more accessible child care, universal pre-K, expanded health care & lower prescription drug costs. That’s why I VOTED to #BuildBackBetter! https://t.co/62kxMAf807

Today, the House passed the #BuildBackBetterAct! This historic bill will change the lives of families in #CA40, California & nationwide for decades to come. I was proud to help pass this bill & I look forward to seeing it signed into law. Full statement: https://t.co/VnRfszL4BI

It’s time to pass the #BuildBackBetterAct. The immigration reform measures in this historic bill would positively impact the lives of millions of undocumented immigrants while boosting their economic contributions & increasing our tax revenue by billions of dollars. https://t.co/b7sQoGw259

It's been a privilege and a joy to serve in Congress alongside my good friend and colleague @RepSpeier. California and our entire nation have benefitted tremendously from her years of service. I wish her and her family all the best in their next chapter!

It's official! Today, @POTUS signed the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act into law. This historic investment is a big win for California and our entire nation as Democrats continue our work to #BuildBackBetter #ForThePeople.

Si no estaba obligado a declarar impuestos, hoy es el ÚLTIMO DÍA para inscribirse en los pagos mensuales para 2021:
https://t.co/x3sOXMhMeb
El #AmericanRescuePlan #ChildTaxCredit ampliado ha brindado seguridad financiera a las familias en todo el país y ha sacado a millones de niños de la pobreza.

The expanded #AmericanRescuePlan #ChildTaxCredit has brought financial security to families nationwide & has lifted millions of children out of poverty. If you weren't required to file taxes, today is the FINAL DAY to sign up for monthly payments for 2021: https://t.co/aDuNWneHpB

Today, @POTUS will sign the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act into law! I was proud to help pass this bill, which makes historic investments that will help us rebuild a strong & inclusive economy in CA & nationwide. https://t.co/zRjdU5PRFy
Si es un veterano o conoce a alguien que necesite ayuda o alguien con quien hablar, llame a @VeteransHealth #VeteransCrisisLine al 1-800-273-8255 y presione 1.
Es fundamental que le recordemos a nuestros veteranos que no están solos y les proporcionemos el apoyo y los recursos que necesiten durante tiempos difíciles.

#VeteransDay (El Día de los Veteranos) también es una gran oportunidad para saludar a los cuidadores de militares y agradecerles por el apoyo y la atención incansable que les brindan a nuestros militares heridos.  #HeroesOcultos

Durante #VeteransDay (El Día de los Veteranos) y todo el año, honramos el heroísmo de los veteranos de nuestra nación y nos recordamos  de los sacrificios que hicieron defendiendo valientemente nuestra nación y nuestros principios en todo el mundo.

It’s critical that we remind veterans they're not alone & provide them with the support & resources they may need during hard times. If you're a vet or know one who needs help or someone to talk to, please call the @VeteransHealth #VeteransCrisisLine at 1-800-273-8255 & press 1.
#VeteransDay is also a great opportunity to salute military caregivers and thank them for the tireless and dedicated support and care they provide for our nation’s wounded warriors. #HiddenHeroes

On #VeteransDay and all year round, we honor the heroism of our nation’s veterans and remind ourselves of the sacrifices they made courageously defending our nation and ideals around the world. https://t.co/Jtlf4NILeo

El taller virtual también incluirá información sobre cómo acceder a Internet y servicios de bajo costo de @DPSS_CalFresh. Registrese aquí:
https://t.co/PpGUMtYMaP

The virtual workshop will also include information about how to access low-cost internet and services from @DPSS_CalFresh. Register here:

Si usted no estaba obligado a declarar impuestos, solo quedan 5 DÍAS para registrarse y recibir pagos: https://t.co/b5BEtIYE52

La ampliación del #AmericanRescuePlan (Plan de Rescate Estadounidense) #ChildTaxCredit (crédito tributario por hijo) ya ha sacado a millones de niños de la pobreza y ha brindado seguridad financiera a las familias por todo el país.
https://t.co/EKGQLJlnYl

The expanded #AmericanRescuePlan #ChildTaxCredit has already lifted millions of children out of poverty & brought financial security to families nationwide. If you weren't required to file taxes, there are only 5 DAYS left to sign up to receive payments: https://t.co/b5BEtIYE52

Today the @USMC turns 246! I'm the proud wife of a U.S. Marine veteran & I'm grateful every day for the service & sacrifices the Marines have made for over two centuries to defend our nation & its ideals around the globe. #SemperFi #MarineCorpsBirthday https://t.co/aLaZvjVEv5
¡Comience el proceso temprano para ayudar a garantizar la renovación oportuna de su estatus de DACA!

RECORDATORIO IMPORTANTE PARA LOS BENEFICIARIOS DE #DACA en #CA40 y en todo el país: @USCIS los anima a solicitar la renovación 120-150 días (4-5 meses) ANTES de que expire su DACA actual y su autorización de empleo.

IMPORTANT REMINDER FOR #DACA RECIPIENTS in #CA40 & nationwide: @USCIS encourages you to apply for renewal 120-150 days (4-5 months) BEFORE your current DACA and employment authorization expire. Please begin the process early to help ensure timely renewal of your DACA status!

My colleagues and I pressed the previous admin to increase the federal cost share for COVID-related costs, & I'm glad the Biden Admin has taken this necessary action & extended the time period for reimbursement to help relieve the financial burden on state and local governments.

This is great news! I thank @POTUS for extending @FEMA's reimbursement of COVID-19 emergency response costs to states, tribes & territories through April 1, 2022 at 100% federal cost share, including for @NationalGuard personnel helping combat the virus. https://t.co/4AXuxqV6OD

Three years ago today, the most destructive wildfire in CA history began. The #CampFire took at least 85 lives before being fully contained 17 days later. Today we remember all those who perished & who lost their homes & thank the amazing first responders who saved so many lives.
If you haven’t already, a reminder to move your clocks back by one hour. Already looking forward to Spring! #DaylightSavingsTime

On behalf of my constituents & families nationwide, I was proud to help pass the Bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, which will make overdue changes to our infrastructure and set our nation & economy up for decades of progress and success. https://t.co/Whul2W8NVS
el trato inhumano adicional de los solicitantes de asilo que traería si fuera reinstalado debido a la orden tribunal.

Me opongo firmemente al fatalmente defectuoso programa MPP "Permanecer en México.” Hoy, @RepBarbaraLee y yo enviamos una carta al Departamento de Seguridad Nacional y al Departamento de Estado señalando las muchas fallas del programa y...

I strongly oppose the fatally flawed "Remain In Mexico" MPP program. Today, @RepBarbaraLee & I sent a letter to DHS & the State Dept. pointing out the program's many flaws & the further inhumane treatment of asylum seekers it would bring if reinstated as ordered by the courts. https://t.co/HDESJT53Pg
a los solicitantes de asilo que traería la reinstalación ordenada por la corte.

Me opongo firmemente al incurable programa "Permanecer en México." Hoy, @RepBarbaraLee y yo enviamos una carta a @DHSgov y @StateDept enfatizando la falta de autoridad legal, el riesgo de desviar recursos y el trato inhumano...

I strongly oppose the incurable "Remain in Mexico" program. Today, @RepBarbaraLee & I sent a letter to @DHSgov & @StateDept emphasizing the lack of legal authority, risk of diverting resources, & inhumane treatment to asylum seekers a court-ordered reinstatement would bring. https://t.co/vcB9pHW5RW

As a CA member & chair of the DHS Approps Subcommitee, I'm thrilled @FEMA has awarded grants to the Cities of Los Angeles & Long Beach for food distribution they provided during the pandemic. It was my privilege as chair to partner w/ FEMA to ensure this assistance was provided.

Thrilled the Senate has confirmed Robert Santos as @uscensusbureau Director - the first Latino & person of color to permanently hold the position! He is expected to serve through 2026 & will play a crucial role in #2030Census prep to ensure we get an accurate, complete count.

As of today, proof of full #COVID19 vaccination is required to enter bars, lounges, nightclubs, breweries, wineries, distilleries & other venues in LA County. Find more info in this article and be sure to #GetVaccinated to keep our communities safe!
https://t.co/foYp9FMXAZ
Pueden encontrar más información y verificar su elegibilidad para recibir esta asistencia aquí: https://t.co/tt3EikodDA

Buenas noticias: @LADWP comenzara una iniciativa de asistencia de deuda para clientes agobiados por facturas de servicios públicos no pagados que califiquen debido a los impactos económicos de la pandemia de #COVID19

Great news: @LADWP is starting a debt assistance initiative for qualifying customers burdened by unpaid utility bills due to the economic impacts of the #COVID19 pandemic. Find more info and check your eligibility for assistance with unpaid bills here: https://t.co/tt3EikodDA

With kids ages 5-11 now eligible for the Pfizer vaccine, a reminder that @FEMA is reimbursing state/local governments for costs of vaccine distribution as well as for vaccination facilities, medical staff, PPE, training, transportation, communications efforts, & other services. https://t.co/sFojzEtGjE

Once again, Senate Republicans have blocked legislation that would help ensure fair access to the ballot box. While this was not at all surprising, it's deeply concerning that the right of Americans of all communities to have a voice is still at risk. 
https://t.co/NiX6oPuzQz
Puede programar una cita para sus hijos y obtener más información sobre las vacunas pediátricas de Pfizer en https://t.co/r8unnAMZ5d o https://t.co/MEwoEifSWf

.@lapublichealth tendrá equipos móviles de vacunación disponibles para proveedores que necesiten asistencia adicional para ayudar a vacunar a nuestros niños. También ofrecerán dosis pediátricas en 480 eventos escolares con un enfoque en áreas de alta necesidad.
Con los niños de regreso a la escuela y participando en actividades extracurriculares, animo a los padres y cuidadores a vacunar a sus hijos para ayudar a protegerlos a ellos y a los demás.

Le agradezco a la Embajadora Reynoso por sus años de servicio público y por promover el bienestar, la seguridad y la igualdad de nuestras comunidades latinas. Es un honor para mí presentarle este premio para celebrar sus muchos logros. ¡Felicidades, Embajadora!

La distinguida carrera de la Embajadora Reynoso ha incluido su labor como ex Embajadora de los Estados Unidos en Uruguay, Co-presidenta del Consejo de Política del Género de la Casa Blanca y Asistente del Presidente y Jefa de Gabinete de la Dra. Jill Biden.
Este año, me complace presentárselo a la embajadora de los Estados Unidos en España y Andorra, Julissa Reynoso.

Cada año, el Premio Edward R. Roybal de @NALEO por Servicio Público Sobresaliente se presenta a líderes que han demostrado su compromiso de servir a nuestras comunidades latinas y a todos los estadounidenses.

I thank Ambassador Reynoso for her years of public service & for advancing the wellbeing, security, and equality of our Latino communities & I'm honored to present her with this award to celebrate her many accomplishments. Congratulations, Ambassador!

Ambassador Reynoso's distinguished career has included serving as former U.S. Ambassador to Uruguay, Co-Chair of the Gender Policy Council at the White House, and Assistant to the President and Chief of Staff to Dr. Jill Biden. https://t.co/20mcs5yRQn
